main.description: I am ambitious and driven. I thrive on challenge and constantly set goals for myself, so I have something to strive toward. I'm not comfortable with settling, and I'm always looking for an opportunity to do better and achieve greatness.
main.bio: I'm a student of the ACADEMY OF CRYPTOGRAPHY TECHNIQUES. I have a lot of passion and ambition that I want to be the best version of myself. I always try to learn and develop myself. There's always a direction to move forward. I hope I have a better life and do more useful things later.

education.description: I learned about cryptography and how to pentest a program or application.
